welcome_message_body: "Welcome to L'Ile-Saint-Denis, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque views. We are thrilled to have you here and invite you to discover and savor all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Divided into seven sub-terminals (2A to 2G), serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster connection speeds.
Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but limited to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
